name: Small Planet
description:
Celebrating over 10 years of designing, developing, and supporting award-winning mobile and web products. We’ve delivered over 100 successful applications and hundreds of updates across multiple platforms. We work collaboratively under one roof in Brooklyn, NY.
Honored as Technical.ly Brooklyn's Design/Dev Firm of the Year, and winners of the Communication Arts Magazine Award of Excellence, the Fast Company Innovation By Design Award, and the Webby Award.
 
We have deep experience in Android and iOS development (Objective-C, Swift, Java, Unity, React Native, and Xamarin), and we recently opened a lab dedicated to machine learning and SaMD (Software as a Medical Device).
